subtitleNullable: Face images dataset with happy label (0/1)
descriptionNullable:
# Overview

Dataset contains images of faces and their labels denoting happy or not (0/1). It can be used to train machine learning algorithms for image binary classification.

# Key Features

- **HDF5 Format:** Dataset is stored in [HDF5 Format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hierarchical_Data_Format). The hierarchy is:
```text
. train.h5 (HDF5 file)
+-- train_set_x (HDF5 dataset)
|   +-- 'numpy.ndarray' (600, 64, 64, 3)
+-- train_set_y (HDF5 dataset)
|   +-- 'numpy.ndarray' (600,)
+-- list_classes (HDF5 dataset)
|   +-- 'numpy.ndarray' (2,)

. test.h5 (HDF5 file)
+-- test_set_x (HDF5 dataset)
|   +-- 'numpy.ndarray' (150, 64, 64, 3)
+-- test_set_y (HDF5 dataset)
|   +-- 'numpy.ndarray' (150,)
+-- list_classes (HDF5 dataset)
|   +-- 'numpy.ndarray' (2,)
```
- **Size:** Dataset has 750 labelled samples of size 10MB. Training set has 600 samples and test set has 150 samples.
- **Image Resolution:** Images with `height x width = 64 x 64 pixels` and 3 channels (RGB).

# Usage

This dataset can be used as shown in the notebook: [[DL.AI] Happy House Dataset: Example](https://www.kaggle.com/code/shivamaggarwal513/dl-ai-happy-house-dataset-example).

# References

- [DeepLearning.AI](https://www.deeplearning.ai)
